statements: SELECT * FROM astronauts_health WHERE age < 30
SELECT name, blood_type FROM astronauts_health WHERE heart_rate > 70
SELECT name, weight_kg FROM astronauts_health WHERE blood_type = 'O'
SELECT name, age, medical_history FROM astronauts_health WHERE weight_kg > 80.00
SELECT astronaut_id, name, blood_type, heart_rate FROM astronauts_health WHERE age >= 25
SELECT * FROM astronauts_health WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT name, age, blood_type, weight_kg FROM astronauts_health ORDER BY age
SELECT name, medical_history, heart_rate FROM astronauts_health WHERE weight_kg < 70 ORDER BY heart_rate ASC LIMIT 4
SELECT * FROM astronauts_health WHERE blood_type = 'AB' AND heart_rate > 80
SELECT age, name FROM astronauts_health WHERE medical_history LIKE '%injury%' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM health_records;
SELECT astronaut_id, heart_rate FROM health_records ORDER BY heart_rate DESC;
SELECT astronaut_id, blood_pressure FROM health_records WHERE weight > 70;
SELECT astronaut_id, heart_rate, weight FROM health_records WHERE blood_pressure LIKE '12%';
SELECT astronaut_id, medical_history FROM medical_records WHERE astronaut_id = 3;
SELECT astronaut_id, heart_rate, blood_pressure, weight FROM health_records WHERE astronaut_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM health_records WHERE weight > 70;
SELECT astronaut_id, medical_history FROM medical_records WHERE astronaut_id = 2;
SELECT astronaut_id, heart_rate, weight FROM health_records WHERE blood_pressure = 'normal';
SELECT astronaut_id, medical_history, allergies FROM medical_records WHERE medical_history LIKE '%injury%';
SELECT * FROM astronaut;
SELECT id, name FROM astronaut WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, age, weight FROM astronaut WHERE blood_type = 'A+' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM health_record ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT condition_name, treatment FROM medical_condition WHERE astronaut_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM astronaut;
SELECT name, age, weight FROM astronaut WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM health_record ORDER BY date DESC;

SELECT astronaut.name, health_record.temperature, medical_condition.condition_name FROM astronaut JOIN health_record ON astronaut.id = health_record.astronaut_id JOIN medical_condition ON astronaut.id = medical_condition.astronaut_id WHERE medical_condition.condition_name = 'Cold';

SELECT astronaut.name, health_record.heart_rate FROM astronaut JOIN health_record ON astronaut.id = health_record.astronaut_id WHERE health_record.heart_rate > 80 ORDER BY health_record.heart_rate DESC, astronaut.name;
SELECT * FROM astronauts;
SELECT name, age FROM astronauts WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM medical_records ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT name, health_status FROM astronauts WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT astronaut_id, destination FROM space_travel WHERE duration > 10;
SELECT * FROM astronauts ORDER BY age DESC, name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT name, age, health_status FROM astronauts WHERE gender='Male' AND age > 30 ORDER BY age ASC

SELECT astronauts.name, medical_records.diagnosis, medical_records.record_date FROM astronauts INNER JOIN medical_records ON astronauts.astronaut_id = medical_records.astronaut_id WHERE medical_records.diagnosis LIKE '%COVID%' ORDER BY medical_records.record_date DESC

SELECT astronauts.name, space_travel.destination, space_travel.duration FROM astronauts INNER JOIN space_travel ON astronauts.astronaut_id = space_travel.astronaut_id WHERE space_travel.duration > 30 ORDER BY space_travel.duration DESC

SELECT astronauts.name, vital_signs.heart_rate, vital_signs.sign_date FROM astronauts INNER JOIN vital_signs ON astronauts.astronaut_id = vital_signs.astronaut_id WHERE vital_signs.heart_rate > 100 ORDER BY vital_signs.sign_date ASC
SELECT * FROM Astronauts;
SELECT astronaut_id, name, age FROM Astronauts WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM HealthRecords ORDER BY checkup_date DESC;
SELECT test_name, result, test_date FROM MedicalTests WHERE astronaut_id = 3;
SELECT alert_type, alert_date FROM HealthAlerts WHERE astronaut_id = 5 ORDER BY alert_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Astronauts WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, nationality FROM Astronauts WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM Astronauts JOIN HealthRecords ON Astronauts.astronaut_id = HealthRecords.astronaut_id WHERE HealthRecords.heart_rate < 60;
SELECT Astronauts.name AS Astronaut_Name, Medications.medication_name AS Medication_Name FROM Astronauts JOIN Medications ON Astronauts.astronaut_id = Medications.astronaut_id;

SELECT HealthRecords.checkup_date, MedicalTests.test_name, MedicalTests.result FROM HealthRecords JOIN MedicalTests ON HealthRecords.astronaut_id = MedicalTests.astronaut_id WHERE MedicalTests.result = 'Positive';
